parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ECM can cause the vehicle to stall or shut down without warning, leading to a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly stops or stalls without warning
the engine shuts down while driving
the vehicle will not start
the horn fails to work when the ignition switch is turned on.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Firewall Weakness at Clutch Cable Mount
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The thin metal of the firewall at the clutch cable mount can cause the clutch cable to tear a hole in the metal, leading to clutch failure and loss of gear shifting ability, which can result in accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
the vehicle moves on its own when the clutch is pressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the door hinges can cause the door to fall off while driving, creating a hazard for the driver and other road users.
symptoms: The door falls off while driving or opening
the door is loose or unstable
the door hinges are broken or damaged.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hood latch can cause the hood to fly up while driving, obstructing the driver's visibility and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The hood flies up while driving
the windshield is cracked or broken
the hood is loose or unstable
the hood latch is broken or damaged.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the convertible top latch can cause the top to fall down while driving, obstructing the driver's visibility and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The convertible top falls down while driving
the driver's visibility is obstructed
the vehicle loses control
the top is loose or unstable
the top latch is broken or damaged.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A malfunctioning seat belt buckle assembly can cause the seat belt to lock, making it difficult or impossible to release, which can lead to injuries or fatalities in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The seat belt locks and requires force to release
the seat belt buckle button breaks
difficulty releasing the seat belt
especially in the rear seats.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rear brake drum locking up the wheel can cause the vehicle to pull to one side, lose control, or even lead to an accident, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: The rear left brake drum is locking up the wheel even after the brake is released
the vehicle pulls to one side
the vehicle vibrates or shakes
the brake pedal feels spongy or soft
the brake pedal has a delayed response.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can lead to accidents, injuries, or even fatalities, as the vehicle may not be able to stop in time or lose control.
symptoms: The brakes fail to stop the vehicle
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
the brakes make a grinding or screeching noise.
